entrances.entrance: [position 500 500] What a map!

objects.comment: Alias is the entrance of the previous room to return to

combinations.look: My homeland! Basically, a bunch of countries that hate each other connected into an industrial hell.
Magical ice kingdom of goblins faeries and butt trolls.
A rainy tea-obsessed reinessance getting rich on it's mining colonies around the world.
No need for a fridge here. Cold hearts of horned vikings are enough to keep anything frozen.
Liberté, égalité, fraternité ou la mort! I don't know what that means, but they love their guillotines.
In their god and king you trust or you die in the bull-fighting ring. Olé!
Philosophical wonderland ruled by a facist mafia where you act like a Roman or get barbecued like a barbarian.
A democratic heaven full of great inventions, beautiful art and an eternal financial debt
do you call a Blind German? : a Not see. Hahahahaha.
Highly advanced culture of oil-drinking mutants. In money they trust, but they bomb you for free.
Revolutionary gangs fighting each other while surviving on beans, beer and selling illegal plantlife to Texas.
Enjoy the beautiful tourist heaven until you get robbed by multiple pirate gangs at once.
Land of bees and cannibals feeding on each other through sacrifices.
Like Mayana, but with alpacas instead of bees.
Land of soccer players with big butts. Their rulership is chosen each year through a huge soccer tournament.
A sad colony forced to love Asspain
A giant icy prison system connected by trains that run on vodka. Zdravstvuj!
Land of eternal riches and brutal slavery run by an evil parkour-loving prince.
A wonderful place to visit if you want to run away from everything and everyone.
World's biggest exporter of curry, spiritualists and new languages.
They say that north Khmer is the best Khmer.
Not really a country, but an industrial corporation that exports cheap gadgets and imports oxygen.
Tecnology-obsessed shogunat full of extremely fat gladiators and extremely thin girls.
A land of buddhist monks who refuse to fight the colonists from Unwanted Kingdom.
Tourist heaven. Literally. No tourist ever came back from there.
Name is self-explanatory.
Nothing there but insane monsters that turn into tornados.
Sheep, depression, hobbit holes and giant stone heads.
Self proclaimed gods ruling from their giant pyramid tombs and making people build more pyramids.
Once a proud nation of tribes ruled by voodoo shamans, now a property of Unwanted Kingdom.
Dark jungles with mystical tribes, diamond mines and an occasional dinosaur
I got a letter from their prince recently, but with a wrong return address... It's a long story.
A desert kingdom, currently in war with... Texas, I think. Or was it Unwanted Kingdom?
Land of extreme poverty and hunger. Most European countries send armies to battle it's hunger.
I started avoiding all news about it ever since I heard that their insects are bigger then people.
Land inhabited by really strange animals, plants and Frenchmen.
They named it French Africa, then African France, then Frafrica... Eventually, they settled on this.
UK's prisoner colony where everything is upside down and full of giant spiders.
Something burned a hole on my map. Oh well, there's probably nothing important here..

entrances.entrance: [soundtrack joplin][stop] > [room viktorsRoom roaches]
[soundtrack mozart] And now to wash away the roaches and take a bath..

[set mood angry][animation spr_viktor_angry][position player 732 795][fade out 0.03][time 30] > [fade] I can't believe I lost my job... > I should take a bath and relax. > But first, I'm going to vent!
[position player 313 625] Well, that was educational.
[position player 199 675][soundtrack mozart][sound snd_gramophone]Home, sweet home!
[animation player spr_viktor_phone_down] > Nobody's answering. > [if phone = 2] I need to find where I wrote Martin's phone number.

[animation player spr_viktor_phone_up] > [animation player spr_viktor_talk_right_phone] Who is it? > [cloud phone][blocksound][animation player spr_viktor_listen_right_phone] It's Martin, who else would it be? > [cloud phone][blocksound][animation player spr_viktor_listen_right_phone] Anyway, I got no money for phone calls, so call me back, bye! > [animation player spr_viktor_talk_right_phone] OK, but I forgot your phone number... > [blocksound][cloud phone][animation player spr_viktor_listen_right_phone] TOOT-TOOT > [animation player spr_viktor_phone_down] > Now where did I write his number down?! > [set phone 2]

[if phone = 0][animation player spr_viktor_phone_down] > [if phone = 0] That was the phone number of my good friend Martin, but he's not answering right now... > [if phone = 0][skip] > [animation player spr_viktor_phone_up] > [room martinsRoom start]

[position player 199 675][animation player spr_viktor_phone_down] > He hung up... > [set phone 3] > [if phone = 3][destroy viktorsRoom_door_closed_angry][create viktorsRoom_door_closed_happy] Time to conquer the world! > [set phone 3][not item phone][take phone]

combinations.wig: Look at me now. I'm completely Jewish! I have a hair thing and everything! > [talk station_dog] Ach, a fine payot it be. But ye still don' look Scottish, boy
